data.name: 김영균
data.message: Self-sizing cells in UITableView and UICollectionView were added as a feature in iOS 8. This feature allows each cell to determine its own size rather than using a fixed size or asking the table or collection view delegate for the size of each cell.Self-sizing cells in UITableView and UICollectionView were added as a feature in iOS 8. This feature allows each cell to determine its own size rather than using a fixed size or asking the table or collection view delegate for the size of each cell.

data.name: 아이유
data.message: 그러나 시간이 지나도 아물지 않는 일들이 있지 내가 날 온전히 사랑하지 못해서 맘이 가난한 밤이야

data.name: 잔나비
data.message: 나는 읽기 쉬운 마음이야 당신도 스윽 훑고 가셔요 달랠 길 없는 외로운 마음 있지 머물다 가셔요
